CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Data_do_pr_ximo_contato__c), IMAGE("https://hospcom.file.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01531000008stX6&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1502729868000", "Sem Data", 40, 40), IF( Data_do_pr_ximo_contato__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("https://hospcom.file.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01531000008stOs&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1502730159000", "Data Passada", 40, 40), IMAGE("https://hospcom.file.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=01531000008stS6&oid=00Di0000000JVhH&lastMod=1502730193000", "Data Futura", 40, 40) ) )
CustomField.label: Data Prevista
